positions.description: Coastal gun is a manufacturer of weapons suppresors and title 2 firearms , working with modern C&C machining equipment we  try to develop a high quality afordable firearms suppresor. my job is to help in designing  and testing of the new and  current designs to aid in the development of new and possibly ground breaking designs in the industry.

positions.description: Preform numerous repairs on all weapon systems from pistols to howitzers , We also travel to perform inpections on various facilities and equipment , The Armament section also incompasses an electronics and optical / instrument section so cross training on optics to include night vision and thermal devices to radios and GPS units is common when needed.
